Contact.address: H-2, SIPCOT IT Park, Old Mahabalipuram Road, Siruseri, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 603103

Home.title: Deluxe Suite
Home.text: Experience the height of luxury in our Deluxe Suite, featuring a spacious living area, king-sized bed, and stunning city views.

Home.title: Executive Room
Home.text: Perfect for business travelers, our Executive Room offers a comfortable workspace, high-speed internet, and access to our exclusive Executive Lounge.

Home.title: Family Room
Home.text: Designed for families, our Family Room includes two queen beds, a cozy seating area, and kid-friendly amenities to ensure a fun and relaxing stay.

Home.title: Special Offers
Home.text: Book a stay of 3 nights or more and get 20% off, plus complimentary breakfast and spa access.
